records.summary: Candy | Practice | GeeksforGeeks Data Structure Java Python HTML Interview Preparation Courses Tutorials Practice Jobs Menu Back to Explore Page . if you have any questions, please contact us .

Transformers are a new development in machine learning that have been making a lot of noise lately . they can be used to write stories, essays, poems, answer questions, translate between languages, chat with humans, and even pass exams that are hard for humans . transformers keep track of the context of what is being written . if you type “Hello, how are”, the phone may suggest words such as “you” or “your” as the next word .
